thread.title: Ellie Chapman

author: Ellie Chapman
title: Ellie Chapman
text:
When I decided to look online for someone to mind my house and pet, I was slightly overwhelmed, since there are quite a few similar sites.
Luckily, a friend nominated this site TrustedHousesitters.com as particularly safe and efficient.
I was pleased that it wasn't free; it made sense that both parties would need to pay some money up front to the organisation for it to work properly.
The whole experience was exemplary in every way. Thanks guys, keep doing what you're doing !
Cheers,
Leigh
